title: DeDRM_Calibre_Method
description:
This is a plugin for Calibre which allows it to remove DRM protection from Ebooks bought from Amazon.com. Note the DRM is removed when the file is added to Calibre. Adding DeDRM will not remove protection from files already loaded to Calibre.

The recommended method to obtain files on the PC is to use Amazon's Kindle PC app, after giving it your Amazon logon and password. You may also try taking the files off the Kindle through the USB port, but I haven't tried that.

PB won't let me post a web address. For more info Google

DeDRM: Ultimate Calibre DRM Removal Plugin for eBooks

There is also a Readme file packaged with the torrent.

This plugin is a 2013 version and I just used it to break DRM on a freshly purchased Ebook. Older plugins may not work any more. This file is fairly hard to find, and is being removed from file depositories. I don't know of any other torrents.

Please comment here, with any problems or pointers.
